      • runStepsInParallelAndWait

        public void runStepsInParallelAndWait(List<Step> steps)
                               throws StepFailedException
        Run multiple steps in parallel and block waiting for all of them to finish. An exception is thrown (immediately) if any step fails.
        Specified by:
